plot: Kramer is arrested when he is mistaken for a serial killer. After he is exonerated, he, Jerry, and George return to New York.

With Kramer in jail, George and Jerry do their best to try to get him out. They have an interesting ride in a police car, where a handcuffed prisoner offers his own views on how much they should tip the maid at their hotel. At the police station, Kramer gets the third degree in the police interrogation room. Kramer is cleared, but when George and Jerry return to New York, they have a bit of a surprise.—garykmcd
